item.description:
Dine with the upbeat sounds of the JEM Jazz Trio!

Get together with us at Tryst in Arlington Centre - enjoy a la carte brunches. A sample from their website features: The Smoked Brisket Hash complete with two eggs, hollandaise sauce served in a hot skillet is sure to please any palette. The homemade Quiche of the Day is mouth watering accompanied with a side of mixed greens. Don't forget the complimentary fresh warm pastry basket, including Chef Anne's delicious scones, cinnamon rolls and muffins!

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Sunday Jazz Brunch - Tryst in Arlington Centre
